itunes:title: Deuteronomy Week 1 with Jen Wilkin
title: Deuteronomy Week 1 with Jen Wilkin
description:
It’s the first week of our Deuteronomy series, and our hosts are joined by author and Bible teacher, Jen Wilkin. Together, these three explore Moses’s speeches, where he reminds Israel of God's great love and how to live in response to His faithfulness as an established people. We invite you to join us in this study of the Law in expectation of how the Holy Spirit will illuminate the Word in a fresh way.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Deuteronomy reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Deuteronomy collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/deuteronomy-week-1-with-jen-wilkin
